attributes.action: Tougher sentences on pedophiles, rapists, child abusers, and sex offenders.
attributes.additional_details: Too many pedophiles, rapists, sex offenders, and child abusers are offending and reoffending because they know they will not be punished for their crimes. This is having a long lasting impact on the victims of these crimes and their families. There are more than 850,000 registered sex offenders in the UK. This is not acceptable.
attributes.background: Give pedophiles, rapists, child abusers, and sex offenders tougher punishments so it is less likely they will re offend. Make people that have a possibility of offending not want to offend due to the punishment of these crimes.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for child sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618407

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for rape and other sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627495
